version_description:
Hosting
* The mobile app now matches the behavior of the website. When viewing a hosted stream, you can now join the host’s chat while viewing the hosted stream.

* Tapping a hosted stream in the live tab will take you to the channel and chat of the host. Above chat there is now a bar with a “Join” button which will take you directly to the hosted stream.
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations

On iPad, we’re making it easier for you to find the channels you love. The layout of live channels is now optimized for the space on your screen - showing you more channels and more information without having to scroll.

On iPad, we’re making it easier for you to find the channels you love. The layout of live channels is now optimized for the space on your screen - showing you more channels and more information without having to scroll.

We’re excited to announce that Bits are finally available for purchase on iOS. Tap the Bits gem in chat then Cheer your heart out and support your favorite streamer!

You’ll now receive a notification when Drops is available on a channel you’re watching. Tap the notification to link your game account and get free in-game items!

And finally, we’re making Raids official so it’s even easier for everyone to join the party and support other creators and communities that they care about. When you see a Raid message pinned to the top of chat, tap to join the Raid!

We’re excited to announce that Bits are finally available for purchase on iOS. Tap the Bits gem in chat then Cheer your heart out and support your favorite streamer!

You’ll now receive a notification when Drops is available on a channel you’re watching. Tap the notification to link your game account and get free in-game items!

And finally, we’re making Raids official so it’s even easier for everyone to join the party and support other creators and communities that they care about. When you see a Raid message pinned to the top of chat, tap to join the Raid!

Twitch is joining forces with (Coca-Cola)RED in the fight against AIDS. Team up with us this week - watch, donate, and help save lives. Any streamer with !RED in the title of their stream is participating - join them in the fight to end AIDS.

Twitch is joining forces with (Coca-Cola)RED in the fight against AIDS. Team up with us this week - watch, donate, and help save lives. Any streamer with !RED in the title of their stream is participating - join them in the fight to end AIDS.

We're introducing detailed notification settings right within the settings page of the app. Control what types of notifications you see, where you see them, and exactly which channels you get them from all in once place.

We're introducing detailed notification settings right within the settings page of the app. Control what types of notifications you see, where you see them, and exactly which channels you get them from all in once place.

This version brings a number of exciting new updates, including optimizations for the iPhone X.

Mobile Live Dashboard
Streamers now have the live dashboard on mobile. Update your stream info, view stats, and chat from your mobile app while live on desktop

Lastly, you'll notice a new personalized greeting when joining chat on a channel you've never seen before. Tap an emote to say hi!

A Sticky Situation: Twitch Emotes sticker packs now load in iMessage, we squeezed pinch to Zoom back in, and for those tech trendsetters - iPhone X is now improved.

Also in this release:
Mobile Live Dashboard
Streamers now have the live dashboard on mobile. Update your stream info, view stats, and chat from your mobile app while live on desktop

Lastly, you'll notice a new personalized greeting when joining chat on a channel you've never seen before. Tap an emote to say hi!
Sixth Sense: We are so excited about this latest update we’re bumping our version number to 6.  We are introducing Extensions in Mobile and you’ll be able to watch Ads to earn Bits!

A Featured Appearance: Discover popular events and featured broadcasters in our new Featured tab found in the Browse menu.  Also no more accidental channel changes - we've also heard your feedback and removed swipe to surf!
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Sixth Sense: We are so excited about this latest update we’re bumping our version number to 6.  We are introducing Extensions in Mobile and you’ll be able to watch Ads to earn Bits!
Sixth Sense: We are so excited about this latest update we’re bumping our version number to 6.  We are introducing Extensions in Mobile and you’ll be able to watch Ads to earn Bits!
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations

Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
缺陷修复、稳定性修复和应用优化
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations

Enhanced VOD experience: We've added resume watching indicators to help you pick up where you were watching on videos. We've also added buttons to make seeking easier when you want to rewind or jump ahead.
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations

"Streamers, visit your mobile dashboard to see follows, subs and more in real time while live with your new activity feed!

App users can now read and accept Channel Chat Rules before chatting! Let's keep it friendly in here"
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes and UI improvements in Browse and Whisper views.
Now broadcasters can trigger raids manually instead of relying on a 30 second timer.

Now broadcasters can trigger raids manually instead of relying on a 30 second timer.

We've optimized the app to support the newest iPhones.

This is the last release of the Twitch app that will support iOS 9. Our next release will require iOS 10 or higher.

Introducing Tags, a new way to discover streamers on Twitch!

Use Tags to filter the Browse tab and find new streams. Use Tags to find game genres, or specific stream types, like a "Casual Playthrough."

You'll also see Tags alongside each category or stream anywhere thumbnails appear in the app.

Introducing Tags, a new way to discover streamers on Twitch!

Use Tags to filter the Browse tab and find new streams. Use Tags to find game genres, or specific stream types, like a "Casual Playthrough."

You'll also see Tags alongside each category or stream anywhere thumbnails appear in the app.
Got Notifications? You can now see who gifted you subs inside the app!
缺陷修复、稳定性修复和应用优化
缺陷修复、稳定性修复和应用优化

New sorting feature for Browse! This feature will give viewers more ways to to discover Twitch streamers. Users are now able to sort by "Viewers (high to low)", "Viewers (low to high)" and "Recently Started" broadcasts.
You can now configure notifications per channel in settings!
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
You can now add or remove Tags from your streams in the mobile dashboard!
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations

Introducing a way to mark a recommended live channel, video, or category on the discover tab as not interested. You will see an option to mark a recommendation as not interested and tell us why. We will use your preferences to make recommendations better.
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
You can now add or remove Tags from your streams in the mobile dashboard!

Watch Overwatch League with the new Command Center, exclusive to All-Access Passholders. Easy to use controls allow you to select between 26 different views, including the in-game point of view for all 12 players, an overhead map view, and more.
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations
Bug fixes, stability fixes, and app optimizations

什么？Twitch 在进化！
我们正在引入一种能更好地反映、壮大和升华我们社区的全新外观和感觉。

什么？Twitch 在进化！
我们正在引入一种能更好地反映、壮大和升华我们社区的全新外观和感觉。
订阅功能来了！订阅令牌是一种有趣的新订阅方式，能让你从 iOS 应用程序直接订阅您所喜爱的主播。
订阅功能来了！订阅令牌是一种有趣的新订阅方式，能让你从 iOS 应用程序直接订阅您所喜爱的主播。
缺陷修复、稳定性修复和应用优化

我们已在 iOS 设备上推出赠送订阅功能！现在您可以使用订阅令牌购买赠送订阅了！
向您介绍“其他人在观看……”搜索功能！此功能会根据其他用户在观看的内容，在搜索结果中为观众推荐更多可观看的直播。
缺陷修复、稳定性修复和应用优化
推出全新的聊天表情符号描述功能。

投票……一投再投！投票调查现可使用频道点数和呼币进行额外投票了。
您现在可以查看正在进行中和即将开始的掉宝活动，以及先前领取的奖励。观看特定的频道或频道类别即可赚取掉宝。

投票……一投再投！投票调查现可使用频道点数和呼币进行额外投票了。
您现在可以查看正在进行中和即将开始的掉宝活动，以及先前领取的奖励。观看特定的频道或频道类别即可赚取掉宝。
缺陷修复、稳定性修复和应用优化

探索全新的首页页面小工具，让您掌握关注的 Live 频道和他们的时间表。
改进画中画的画质。
最后还有一个新功能，您的通知收件箱有了新面貌！现在新提醒将变得更加醒目。
